page.title: 13Clubs <continued>
page.content:
{Criftins Luncheon Club. } An off shoot of the W.I.,The Luncheon Club is going from strengh to strength.There are now twenty three members who enjoy the fortnightly get together.
{The Working Men's Club.} The Working Mens Club was built sometime in the 1930's.The structure has had several additions to it since. Games of darts,snooker and dominoes are played.
{Criftins M.U. } The Criftins branch of the Mothers Union is attached to Saint Matthew's church criftins and part of the world wide Mothers Union who have their headquarters at Mary Sumner House in London. There are twenty four members in the
